quote: This is a love story. I never knew there were so many kinds of love or that love could make people do so many different things.I never knew there were so many different ways to say goodbye.
quote_letters: THIS IS A LOVE STORY I NEVER KNEW THERE WERE SO MANY KINDS OF LOVE OR THAT LOVE COULD MAKE PEOPLE DO SO MANY DIFFERENT THINGSI NEVER KNEW THERE WERE SO MANY DIFFERENT WAYS TO SAY GOODBYE
